intro: Cardiochlaena sinuosa, commonly known as the zigzag plant, is a flowering plant native to South Africa. It thrives in well-drained soils and full sun, making it a popular choice for rock gardens. Its unique morphology and ornamental value make it a notable species in horticulture.
